prompts: Create a legendary Pokemon resembling a stormy cloud with green accents and purple swirls.
Imagine a mythical creature that embodies the power of the wind, with vibrant colors and unique features.
Design a Pokemon with a whimsical appearance, featuring a cloud-like body and striking color combinations.
Generate a flying-type Pokemon with a distinct shape, showcasing its ability to control weather patterns.
Show me a Pokemon that has a blend of green and purple, evoking a sense of mystery and power.
Make a Pokemon that reflects the essence of a thunderstorm, with swirling patterns and dynamic colors.
Give me a creature that combines elements of nature and weather, with a visually captivating design.

distinctive_features: Green upper body with white accents
